duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead full-cycle recruitment efforts, including candidate evaluation, sourcing, and utilizing ATS to streamline the process.
Coordinate interviews and ensure a positive candidate experience, provide interview training and support to hiring managers.
Develop behavioral interview guides to support hiring manager and panel interviews, deliver and negotiate offers, and process pre-onboarding steps.
Build relationships with candidates, hiring managers, and external partners, design and implement recruiting strategy, and enhance the employer brand through compelling job postings.
Maintain awareness of employment laws, regulations, and utilize recruitment data to analyze sourcing strategies and make data-driven decisions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in HR, Business Administration, or related field
